issue.title: self_collide should be a model property, not a link property

content.raw:
I also contradicted myself (between this and a pull-request). So much for consistency.

Is the proposal to add `self_collide` as a child of `model`? Any link will use the model's `self_collide`, unless the link has a `self_collide` in which case the link's `self_collide` takes precedence?
content.html:
I also contradicted myself (between this and a pull-request). So much for consistency.

Is the proposal to add self_collide as a child of model? Any link will use the model's self_collide, unless the link has a self_collide in which case the link's self_collide takes precedence?
